title: Bigg Boss 13: Devoleena Bhattacharjee-Shehnaz Gill Get Into A Physical Tussle During A Task
text:
Physical assault and attacking are two non-negotiable rules of Bigg Boss and anyone who breaks these get punished by Bigg Boss. Every year, there are dramatic turn of events in a way that people get involved in physical spats and the outcome have never been favorable.

One such dramatic twist will be seen in the the upcoming episode of Bigg Boss 13 as two of the nominated contestants will get into an ugly fight.

In the task given by Bigg Boss, contestants will have to fight, in-order to save themselves from the nominations. They are also instructed to make the game of snakes and ladders with mud. During the task, Mahira completes making her ladder warns everyone that the real fight will begin. After this, Sidharth Shukla warns and reminds everyone that if anyone messes with his ladder, he will break all the other ladders.

However, Paras, who has been tagged as a perpetual offender during these tasks breaks a ladder. After this, Siddharth Shukla goes on to destroy all the other ladders. This further sparks a tussle between them.

Don't Miss 1.6 K SHARES 126 SHARES 2.5 K SHARES 6.1 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES

Amidst this confusion,Devoleena breaks Shehnaz’s ladder and this triggers a physical tussle between them and other housemates as well.





On the episode aired on 22nd October, Bigg Boss declared Asim and Arti safe while all other contestants including Paras Chhabra, Sidharth Shukla, Siddhartha Dey, Rashami Desai, Devoleena Bhattacharjee, Shefali Bagga, Shehnaaz Gill, and Mahira Sharma were nominated.
description: One such dramatic twist will be seen in the the upcoming episode of Bigg Boss 13 as two of the nominated contestants will get into an ugly fight. In the task given by Bigg Boss, contestants will have to fight, in-order to save themselves from the nominations.
